website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung 750 Evo is an moderately expensive SSD that won't let you down in the speed department.
pros: The Samsung SSD 750 Evo is speedy and costs less than other Samsung solid-state drives
The drive includes helpful software and can use your computer's internal memory to get a significant speed boost
cons: The drive is more expensive than competing SSDs, and capacity tops out at just 500GB

customer_reviews.title: Small, Light, Fast.
customer_reviews.text: This object was much lighter than I expected, being not much larger than a credit card and about a quarter of an inch thick. It had SATA power and data ports, and it was recognized and started up on the first try. The computer speed was improved considerably after copying the old drive over to this new one. The only difficulty I had was in mounting it - it was so lightweight and small I almost just let it dangle from the power cable, but in the end slid it into one of the hard drive shelves in the case and just left it sit there. Scotch tape would be more than sufficient for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Staffen

customer_reviews.title: These high performance drives from Samsung are great. Installed in a 7 year old Toshiba Tecra ...
customer_reviews.text: These high performance drives from Samsung are great. Installed in a 7 year old Toshiba Tecra M10, it significantly increased performance. I have bought several of these for various laptops and am never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BDU

customer_reviews.title: Pay the Samsung Premium, It's worth It
customer_reviews.text: Samsung makes the best SSD's hands down. Pay the few extra dollars and get the quality you need. If an SSD goes bad, you are out of luck, it's not like an HDD, so you better be smart, and get a good one. I'm using this as a boot drive on a new system. Super quick boot time, very snappy response times. This is the 3rd Samsung EVO I've bought, and I will almost certainly be buying more of them. Once you've had an SSD fail, you'll understand why it really is important to get a reliable one.
customer_reviews.author: nappydrew

customer_reviews.title: Product dead on arrival no way to return it
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to follow the warranty process, but I was told "The unit you have would be a Korean based model meaning warranty would be done with Samsung of Korea. If you would like assistance with that unit you would need to contact your point of purchase or contact Samsung of Korea." I will never purchase another Samsung product again.
customer_reviews.author: JustRon

customer_reviews.title: Good fast SSD.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 120Gb version for a boot drive for OS and apps, really quick boot times, good software if you choose to use it. No complaints at all. I paid a bit more for Samsung and have some extra peace of mind knowing the drive is of a high quality brand. Plan to add a second SSD at some point for storing games and if I can find a good price on another Samsung, will definitely go that route.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speeds are amazing and we're only using this on a SATA 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Night and day compared to any HDD I've ever used. Speeds are amazing and we're only using this on a SATA 2 connection running in IDE mode (I need to change that soon). Once I do that I should be able to hit over 300MB/s through the Sata 2 interface.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Mack

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Swapped out a WD Spinner with this SSD boot time is less than half of what it was with the Spinner. The transfer program worked perfectly. Wish there was a little more warning on what type of drive interface, a (2) drive Dock and the software do not play well, but I had already planned on using the spinner as a backup drive and had purchased an external drive case and it worked perfectly going forward
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, super fast ssd I'm using the 120gb for my boot/os drive and couldn't be more pleased. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: and it performs wonderfully. Despite a faulty RAM stick the OS and ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed Linux Mint 18.1 onto this SSD, and it performs wonderfully. Despite a faulty RAM stick the OS and SSD were able to perform without crashing, and the reliability of booting onto the drive is really solid. Definitely, check out Samsung solid-state drives.
customer_reviews.author: Scot G Russian

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's very fast, works great. I was originally using a 7200RPM hard drive on a SATA2 connection, but with my new motherboard, processor and this, I can load everything just about instantly. I just offload all but my most-used programs onto my storage drive, since it hasn't got much space.
customer_reviews.author: Nezrok B.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 750 EVO - 120GB - 2.5-Inch SATA III Internal SSD (MZ-750120BW)
customer_reviews.text: It's a SSD that preforms like it should. It's the older Gen SSD, but it works great. Also for the Linux users out there, I didn't have any problems formatting the SSD to use with Linux. No surprise though, with the software of today.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: good for storage not as boot drive.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I have come to realize that this amount of space is not amazing the SSD is amazing it's self, but I will be buying a large size same brand later on down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price at the time of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these since they fit in my laptop, they're okay.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice cheap ssd for my father in law's ssd. It'll serve him well for years to come
customer_reviews.author: A. Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Drive at reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It works. NO issue. I have Samsung SSD 830, 840Pro, 850EVO, and this. They all work without a hitch. Kudos to Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: SNOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Speedy and reliable. I've had a number of SSD's ...
customer_reviews.text: Speedy and reliable. I've had a number of SSD's over the years, with Samsung's consistently lasting the longest (in fact, I have yet to have one fail).
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: Installed it on a slow as snail Dell Inspiron 3000 and now it works so fast! I am so happy I bought this for my laptop. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a solid state drive. All I can say is wow. It gave my slow laptop new life. My laptop is now faster than it has ever been and very quiet. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: LBF - Tacoma, WA

customer_reviews.title: Great for system use
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Working as predicted. Hopefully this lasts longer than my Kingson HyperX, which lasted just outside of its 3-year warranty before turning into a paperweight without warning.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dueck

customer_reviews.title: Good drive - great price - good performance
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 3 of these during the past year. Easy to install, and we punish them with 8-10 hours daily work on graphics render farm. They keep on tickin'
customer_reviews.author: midwest mom & hubby

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice But....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but should have spent just a little more $$$ to get a 250gb or 500gb drive instead. Regardless a friends 3 year old laptop with a single AMD cpu runs a lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This goes on Photo Trips with me so that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This goes on Photo Trips with me so that I can download my phots at the end of the day. Samsung rarely disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Get Samsung SSDs!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an upgrade for an aging HP laptop. Brought the boot time from 90 seconds down to 20 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: E. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Fast SSD, Terrible Packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when opening the box, the SSD sits loose in a little black tray and if facing the wrong way, it will fall right out! Mine fell straight onto the tile floor, luckily it was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M

customer_reviews.title: I am happy I got this
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I got this. I finally built my own high end custom rig and this drive as my main drive works wonderful. It boots up/ restarts so fast, that it generally takes me longer to realize i have to enter my password then the process took.
customer_reviews.author: kyne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect SSD for htpc OS
customer_reviews.text: Its an Evo. Its not a speed demon but I wasnt in need of a super fast ssd. I already own a few 850's (Pro and Evo). This was for an htpc OS disk.
customer_reviews.author: 0Day

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased August 10th 2016, Unit was working fine until yesterday January 14th 2017. Unit will not boot into Windows or recognize any repair discs. Only displays a (-) when trying to boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In Samsung we trust.
customer_reviews.text: Can always trust Samsung SSDs. Had two lesser named SSDs both crash after 15 months while my Samsung 840 EVO and 750 EVO going strong. Will only buy Samsung from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Bestthinginyears

customer_reviews.title: Have had this drive for almost a year now and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this drive for almost a year now and it still very fast and reliable. I will never use any other brand of SSD. Samsung rocks!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than an old time HDD
customer_reviews.text: Nice and fast and a decent price. I'm more than happy so far. If I can remember, I'll write about hgow it's doing a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: Yonaton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was certainly large and super fast enough for /home in a new ubuntu build.
customer_reviews.author: Mimosa Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Another great SSD from Samsung. Easy to use, migrate files, and free software. Robust product backed up by great prices.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan's Happy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Playstation 3
customer_reviews.text: I've replace my PS3 hardrive with this SSD and it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung 750 EVO laptop SSD
customer_reviews.text: Great Samsung 750 EVO laptop SSD, which is slower than 850 EVO version but the price is right. I use it to upgrade older PCs which increase their values. Fast speed for multi-tasking and help boot up a Windows 10 laptop in 10 seconds or less.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Forced to get 750 now that 850's discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had the 5 year warranty like its discontinued older brother, the 850 128gb, but I guess 3 years is as good as it gets in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this as a boot drive for my PC I built a year ago, still no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Denson

customer_reviews.title: Great for task workstations
customer_reviews.text: Breath new life to workstations that may be feeling a bit dated. Great for task workstations.
customer_reviews.author: DraconPern

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and worked wonders for battery life & overall system speed
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to install into my MacBook Pro, and it made my laptop run like the first day I used it! Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: but after figuring that out everything is working good.
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. A bit of an issue getting the plug to connect right, but after figuring that out everything is working good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jungles

customer_reviews.title: it's good no issue
customer_reviews.text: So far ,it's good no issue ,immediately copied Windows 10 .
customer_reviews.author: Thierry

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 750 EVO
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a laptop HDD. Not as fast as a "PRO" version -- but still pretty quick, and I wanted the Samsung reliability at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good solid SSD
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good solid SSD. I have bought several and haven't had any problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: fjwoodar

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent SSD! My computer runs so efficiently and perfect now. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Madden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. My computer work faster than before with this SATA.
customer_reviews.author: Linghuo.li

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working great! Even more responsive than Raptor 10K rpm drives.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great in an all in one, much faster that original ata hard drive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung SSD
customer_reviews.text: Made my old computer run like a new one....No problems moving all my files to the new drive.
customer_reviews.author: James McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Super fast-Great for your OS!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my OS boot, because of using this hard drive my computer boots faster than my TV can turn on. I'm very impressed with Samsung's SSD tech. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Selzamija

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 of these for a RAID 1 setup. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for a RAID 1 setup. Worked out of the box with zero issues. Exactly what I expected from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SSD came DOA(Dead on arrival) so i immediately sent back ...
customer_reviews.text: SSD came DOA(Dead on arrival) so i immediately sent back after doing many tests to be sure the drive was dead before wasting my time shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stupak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice SSD that I own several of. I have set to experience any failures with these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever made
customer_reviews.text: Revived my 10y/o PC. Have windows 10 on it now.
customer_reviews.author: Arvinraj A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install as my macOS drive on a MacPro. It's running great with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Coker

customer_reviews.title: Great for an OS/Boot drive
customer_reviews.text: Great for an OS/Boot drive. Using it with Windows 8.1 Pro 64bit and boot times are usually 10 - 12 seconds (from BIOS Screen to Login). After configuration about 112 GB is usable. Speeds are around 450 to 500 mb/s.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: IT Guy recmmmended this product
customer_reviews.text: Just what my IT guy ordered....he said it was the best way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Palmatier

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: None of the competitors come close to the value, performance, and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It has a decent amount of storage space for the price and my PC boots off of it in 2-4 seconds. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Works well in our desktops
customer_reviews.text: I have had good success with this drive and have purchased quite a few for our Windows 7 desktops
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is currently doing what it should be doing. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an sad for fast load times in h1z1 well I definitely got it, no regrets
customer_reviews.author: jerrell

customer_reviews.title: Another winner from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung 750 EVO works great so far. Just got it today and installed it. Works great with Linux Mint MATE in a Shuttle XS35V4 mini PC. The temperature in this mini case runs 5 degrees cooler after replacing a traditional 320gb spinning laptop hard drive with this one. The mini PC boots in 12 seconds, about 4 times faster than the traditional drive. I also own 120gb Samsung 470, 830 and 840 SSDs. The 750 EVO is way faster than the 470. So far, this drive looks like another trouble free winner from Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: The Penguin

customer_reviews.title: A bit overprice and no software !
customer_reviews.text: I am still surprised to find out that Samsung does NOT ship any software to mirror the existing disk. That's why I can't give it a 5 Star. The other reason is that the price is not competitive to other vendors. You can find larger capacity SSD drives for less price that this one. Keep in mind that the MacOS will eat up 45 gig of this disk drive!! So, with any decent size applications you are going to have less than 80 gigs to work with. And 80 gigs is not a lot of storage these days.
customer_reviews.author: David Mortaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice SSD. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Nice SSD. You get what you pay for. The SSD itself feels weak, almost like plastic, but functions very well and isn't meant to be a otterboxed iPhone case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get This hard drive and skip the cheap drives
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive worked well and was a easy install on my Laptop. Took 3 minutes to install and discover drive. My laptop now boots up withing 9-11 seconds from start to finish. Also Samsung makes the best drives on the marked. Don't go cheap on hard drives.
customer_reviews.author: Monsoon36

customer_reviews.title: This does only 1/2 of the specified speed they are ...
customer_reviews.text: This does only 1/2 of the specified speed they are advertising on Windows 7 and MacOS. About 250mbps read and write, not 500+. Tested using multiple utilities.
customer_reviews.author: x0054

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I intended to use it as a back-up drive but it doesn't work. It won't format and my computer does not see it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W. Zingen

customer_reviews.title: There are better options with lower price
customer_reviews.text: This SDD it is fair, not but impresive. I've got one samsung 840 evo that works much much better than this one. Pros: easy to install, just one cardboard box Cons: price, not as good as some older models I am a little dissappointed with SAMSUNG, some times it is more a "brandmark" than really good products.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Installation CD is NOT in package. After installing OS ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation CD is NOT in package. After installing OS and had PC up and running, a lot of glitches appeared and system kept crashing. Drive finally disappeared from Bios and system profile. Has a PC builder try to figure out the issue with no luck. System is brand new from motherboard to case. Tried looking for Samsung 750 EVO and was nowhere to be found. Removed HD and bought PNY XLR8.
customer_reviews.author: Thuyet Vo

customer_reviews.title: Order was missing user guide and software
customer_reviews.text: No software or user guide with the ssd card. They were listed on the envelope with the warranty info but was not enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: QueenP

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far.  No real discernable difference in speed from the pro ones.
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. No real discernable difference in speed from the pro ones. Understand that longevity is theoretically lower but don't care. When buying SSD's, only buy Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: buttersh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great SSD at a great price! Perfect for our old touchscreen industrial computer.
customer_reviews.author: dlhfoto

product_meta.title: Samsung 750 EVO - 120GB - 2.5-Inch SATA III Internal SSD (MZ-750120BW)
product_meta.description: PC users are choosing high-speed SSDs for better computing performance and reliability. The Samsung 750 EVO SSD is the ideal choice for high-performance everyday computing. With sequential read and write speeds up to 540/520 MB/s and random read and write speeds up to 98,000/88,000 IOPS*, your multitasking will be faster than ever.
feature_bullets: NAND flash-based, lightweight, and shock and vibration resistant for working on the go
Encryption and Secure Erase provide reliable data protection while maintaining high performance
Included Contents: 2.5” (7mm) SATA III (6GB/s) SSD & User Manual (All Other Cables, Screws, Brackets Not Included).
Free download of Samsung Data Migration and Magician software available for easy installation and SSD management

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars505 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
